overview:
Roy is an Architect, Environmentalist and Urban Designer with many years experience gained in London UK, Africa and the Middle East.

He is a graduate of the Architectural Association, London and is a member of the Royal Istitute of British Architects, the Institute of South African Architects, the Urban Design Group and the Saudi Green Building Council. He served on the D’Urban Changes 2020 Future Forum and the Olympic Infrastructure Committee for the Durban Olympic Bid.

Roy is currently consulting in Saudi Arabia on major new communities, using sustainable design principles specialising in multi-disciplinary environmental management techniques for urban design and mass transportation including underground rail and metro systems.
